thread.title: Lovely hotel.
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel. - Review of Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TJandJude
title: Lovely hotel.
text:
Stayed here overnight recently. Gorgeous little hotel, service was excellent and we had a lovely breakfast. We received a free room upgrade too as it was my friends birthday...thank you so much Laurine we couldn't of asked for better care. Would definitely stay here again.
The hotel is 15 to 20 minute walk from the Eiffel Tower (depending on how quick you walk) Shops and restaurants all within walking distance too.
